Workflow.Name: RES - SR - Prevent Completion if WO not closed
Workflow.Description: As a SWE, I want to prevent GFSC users from complete/resolve an SR with an open (in progress) WO, in order to ensure SR/WO records statuses stay in-sync

LocalizedName.description: RES - SR - Prevent Completion if WO not closed

Description.description: As a SWE, I want to prevent GFSC users from complete/resolve an SR with an open (in progress) WO, in order to ensure SR/WO records statuses stay in-sync

label.description: Contact Tier1 to close the related Work Order and then Service Request will be completed automatically!!
